ncrsGatheringSites.abcd:LocalityText: Sta. SE.8137: Norway, Osundet, between Hjelte Fjord and Atlantic Ocean; 60° 33'N 4°50'E; depth 12-20 m, shell gravel and Laminaria; triangulare dredge; 1.ix.1981

SE.7404: Great Brittain, Anglesey, Cemlyn Bay; 53° 24'N 4°31'W; rocky littoral; 15.viii.1974
EG.680525: Germany, Bayern, gorge in Erlau (= 8 km E of Passau), along Margaritifera brook; 25.v.1968
AV.600808: France, dep. Cotes-du-Nord, Le-Vieux-Bourg (= 3 km NE of Sables-d'Or);8.viii.1960
CANCAP-IV, Sta. 4.070: Canary Islands, SE of Lanzarote; 28°56'N 13°33'W; depth 41-50 m, sand with yellow-grey clay with red algae; triangular dredge; 20.v.1980

Sta. MAU.030: Off Mauritania; 18°49'N 16°24'W; depth 36 m, muddy grey sand, tubeworms macroforaminifera; Van Veen grab; 9.vi.1988
